item.title: Trudeau accuses Trump of sidling up to Russia and blasts new tariffs: ‘Donald, this is a very dumb thing to do’
item.description: Canada's outgoing Prime Minister Justin Trudeau vowed retaliatory tariffs on more than $100 billion of American goods in response to Trump's 25% tarif...

item.title: Target has a plan to add $15 billion to its sales by 2030 but it has plenty of problems to fix to get there
item.description: The cheap-chic retailer plans to add $15 billion to its topline.

item.title: Target CEO joins swarm of Fortune 500 executives warning of bigger bills as Trump’s tariff fallout hits the grocery aisle
item.description: Target shoppers can expect to see price increases on produce “over the next couple of days,” boss Brian Cornell said on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump’s planned crypto reserve pits Bitcoin loyalists against ‘alt-coin’ boosters
item.description: Cameron Winklevoss says “Bitcoin is the only asset that meets the bar for a store of value reserve asset.”

item.title: Trump’s budget cuts threaten AI research, top scientists warn
item.description: Academic research into AI is at risk from President Trump's cost-cutting, critics say.
